subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi said Alberto Gonzalez, who had a stint with the team earlier this year, will most likely fill in at shortstop and third base after Reid Brignac was designated for assignment.
snippet: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi said Alberto Gonzalez, who had a stint with the team earlier this year, will most likely fill in at shortstop and third base after Reid Brignac was designated for assignment.
